I moved to a new city to escape the judgemental people in my hometown.
I am excited to start a new chapter of my life with my fiance.
I'm a clumsy blonde, but my dog loves me anyway.
I have a brother and sister, but I'm closer to my brother.

content.text: Hello there! How are you doing today?
Hello! Doing well, thank you for asking! How about yourself?
I'm doing well, thanks! I'm just getting ready to go for a walk in the park.
That sounds nice! I love going for walks in the park. I'm more of a morning person though, so I usually go in the morning.
I'm more of a night person, so I usually go in the evening.
I guess we're opposites! Do you have any family in the area?
I do, but I'm not very close to them. I moved to this city to escape the judgemental people in my hometown.
I understand that. I'm not really close to my parents either.
That's good to know. I'm glad I'm not the only one.
I'm sure we'll get along just fine.
I love reading, watching movies, and spending time with my dog.
Me too! I love reading business and finance books in my free time. I also love ballet and I'm pretty fast at it.
Wow, that's amazing! I'm not very good at ballet, but I do enjoy watching it.
You should try it sometime! It's a lot of fun.
Great! I'm sure you'd be great at it.
